## Services

We offer two tiers of services to support your goals.

### Tier 1: Strategy

We will advise you on the following topics:

-   LLM performance issues: (cost, quality, speed)
-   RAG, Fine-Tuning, and Prompt Engineering
-   Upskilling your team: We will rapidly upskill and unblock your team with focused debugging sessions.
-   Strategy & Hiring: We will introduce you to talent, vendors, and partners in our network.
-   Evaluation Systems

We will give you ongoing feedback and guidance via regular meetings with your team. This will help you avoid common pitfalls and select the right tools and techniques, saving you time and money. 

### Tier 2: Comprehensive

Everything in Tier 1, plus:

-  **Implementation:** We will write production-ready code and/or prototypes to accelerate your AI product development.
- **Domain-Specific Evaluation Systems:** We will design and implement custom evaluation systems to measure the performance and reliability of your LLMs.
-   **Hands-On Model Optimization:** We will fine-tune, prompt engineer and debug models to improve performance and efficiency.
-  **Development Tools and Infrastructure:** Build custom tools and infrastructure to streamline your AI development process.
-   **Content and Writing:** Produce written documents and blogs to communicate best practices, methodologies, and practical case studies to your stakeholders
-   **Team Growth & Hiring:** Work with 2-4 people individually on your team to rapidly upskill them on AI.  We will also help you source and evaluate key hires.

### Pricing

We work on a monthly retainer basis[^2]. The cost depends on the tier of service you choose:

- Strategy: $183,600 for a 3-month engagement.
- Comprehensive: $975,000 total for a 3-month engagement.

Contact us at `consultingl@parlance-labs.com` to discuss starting an engagement.  You can also book a [paid call](https://calendly.com/hamel-husain/consultation) if you need immediate short-form advice.
